page.title: 07Wimpey Builders.
page.content: {Wimpey}build houses ,design houses and sell them .In Threemilestone there are 3 estates ,the Pendeen and the Pengelly Farm estates which were unfinished at the time of the project. {Wimpey}look for fields near shops and jobs. If they may get{permission}then they buy the land and get{planning {permission.}Then they get the{ {Architects}to design the house.Then they dig the foundations and put concrete in and then they put up a wooden side frame.The builders put up fire barriers and then they put on the roof and tile it.The bricks go up on the outside of the wooden frame and then they build the inside walls.Once the inside is finished then the lawn is turfed. The house is normally sold before the house is finished.The house is sold by {Estate Agents.}
